title: kai'sa in current game
body:
said they're going to bed in 10 minutes so theyll afk at that time? why que. said its a free loss and thats shes trolling because we didnt dodge for it? wtf is wrong with this community

edit finished game: she literally tried after trolling for a solid 25 minutes. dancing at our tower while we ping for help, she ran into the enemy base when ALL of their towers were up. literally ran to get beamed to death. then ping trolled all us when we died like we were the problem.

replies.body: You cant even punish players like that

Online game that doesn't have any consequence irl and isn't prioritized. 

Is the logic of the Kai'sa.


It's valid logic, just asshole logic.
